title: Pat Zeitly 6/6: NBA Finals, Elvis, American Fascism, 44%, WWDC
itunes:title: Pat Zeitly 6/6: NBA Finals, Elvis, American Fascism, 44%, WWDC
description:
In this edition of Pat Zeitly, Jack and Miles discuss the NBA Finals (and other stuff Jack noticed on TV over the weekend), how American Fascism is coming along , 44% of Republicans believing mass shootings are an "unfortunate part of a free society", and WWDC 2022!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
